DOC.brief_summary: To determine the relationship between the result of amniotic fluid optical density between 26 and 36 6/7 weeks of pregnancy and the risk of developing neonatal respiratory distress syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Amniotic Fluid Optical Density Determination as a Test for Assessment of Fetal Lung Maturity.
DOC.criteria: Pregnancy between 26 and 36 6/7 weeks. Problems in the handling of the amniotic fluid sample that prevented the calculation of the optical density.
